features: TEMPUR-PEDIC MEMORY FOAM SEAT CUSHION—The legendary comfort and support of TEMPUR material, now in a contoured seat cushion.
PERFECTED FOR YOU—Our signature TEMPUR material adapts to your shape to distribute weight more evenly, making it an ideal seat cushion for pressure relief.
WASHABLE & REMOVABLE COVER — Simply remove the allergen-resistant cover and toss in the wash to keep your memory foam chair cushion feeling and looking fresh.
DURABLE & RELIABLE—Adaptive TEMPUR material never loses its shape, offering superior support and alignment year after year.
body.description: Make any average sitting surface supportive and comfortable with the TEMPUR-Pedic Seat Cushion. This molded memory foam cushion relieves pressure and distributes weight evenly over its contoured surface, so you can sit comfortably for extended periods of time. The removable, washable, and allergen-resistant cover keeps your memory foam seat cushion feeling and looking fresh after every use. It’s the only seat cushion backed by TEMPUR innovation, and your key to sitting comfortably—anywhere.

productInformation.name: Warranty Description
productInformation.value: This limited warranty is valid only in connection with the original purchase of new products from authorized retailers and extends from the original purchase date of the original product purchased. An “original purchaser,” for the purposes of this limited warranty, is an individual or entity who purchases the product directly from tempur-pedic or an authorized retailer of tempur-pedic with the intent to use the product for personal consumer use and not for commercial or industrial use and not with the intent to resell the product. An “authorized retailer,” for purposes of this limited warranty, is an individual or entity authorized by tempur-pedic to sell product directly to original purchasers. An individual or entity that purchases the product from whatever source with the intent to resell the product is an unauthorized reseller (“unauthorized reseller”)".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wirecutter Recommended & Made in the USA
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent seat cushion that is recommended by NYT Wirecutter reviews. We bought another one to replace the one bought 20 years ago whose cover was badly stretched. And, much appreciated added bonus, all of it is made in the USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars memory foam seat cushion works well on kayak seat
reviews.reviewText: The memory foam (Temperpedic) seat cushion works really well to make my kayak seat much more comfortable. The kayak seat by itself is totally flat and hard and not very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Way too small
reviews.reviewText: I saw the reviews saying this cushion is too small, but figured I would be ok since I'm a small person. But no, this thing is seriously tiny. I'm 5'7" and 120lbs, and I could only fit about 2/3 of my butt onto this. The edges were hitting right at my hip bursa, making it super painful to use. It's a shame because the foam seems to be nice quality. No idea why they designed it to only be usable by the tiniest of people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but needs a few
reviews.reviewText: As a helicopter pilot, I use this seat cushion for up to 8 hours a day to reduce fatigue and prevent back, leg, and knee pains. It's a lifesaver for those purposes, but it has a few design flaws. I considered buying an Oregon Aero seat cushion with the added lumbar support ($250 total and long wait for delivery) but chose this one because of the price.Likes:Very comfortable for sitting long periods of time. Durable so far. The cushion hasn't broken down at all over the past 6 months of use.Dislikes:A bit too thick. Slippery cover causes the cushion to slide around on seat, especially leather seats. It feels like sitting on a wood plank in cold weather (below 50 degrees F), so if you leave it in a cold car overnight, you won't like it in the morning. A built-in lumbar support (like the Oregon Aero product) would be nice also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just purchased my second cushion, for another chair.
reviews.reviewText: When a customer comes back to buy a second cushion for a second chair, you know the customer believes in the product. It is what I just did!I have compressed discs in my back. Sitting incorrectly makes it flair up. These cushions keep me holding my posture correctly.I cannot recommend this cushion enough.Love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I almost didn’t order
reviews.reviewText: I thought it was too expense and I could get by without it. But figured I’d try it and it wouldn’t be worth the money and I’d return it. Not a chance!!! This is the best chair cushion ever! I couldn’t sit for more than an hour or two without pain. With this 8 hours is no problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too small to be comfortable for heavy frames
reviews.reviewText: I can tell by the feel that it is a good material and can be comfortable, but it's too small for a large frame person to really gain relief out of it. As with all small sized cushions the side will dig into your thighs and legs. My butt does kind of feel nice.Maybe if you were a child you could fully enjoy this size, but for something that costs almost $100 I'm really disappointed. For something that cost that much they could have at least made it full sized.Update: Gave it a bit more time. Yeah, too small length and width wise. Hurts like hell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It feels firm at first, but it flattens out after a few minutes. I don't consider myself obese. I'm under 175 pounds. It's also quite small and slides around a lot. The cushion is very expensive, and, it turns out, not worth it.
Es muy cómodo y me lo recomendó mi traumatólogo después de mi cirugía de columna
Great cushion. Not for the larger butts though.
Proud to just as described and comfortable to use
a bit firm and would have liked it a bit bigger/wider - will need to test out over time to see results.

El asiento es muy práctico porque lo puedes poner donde lo requieras, en el carro, silla de ruedas, o en alguna otra silla o banca, es cómodo y aparte de que el forro se quita y se puede lavar perfectamente.
